@ Metalprofi666, the xgd3 games can be burned to a standard dual layer, the burn will fail due to disc size but the data missed off is just disc padding and will not effect the game in any way. There are new burn instructions for imgburn contained with the files you can also read through the Gears of War 3 nfo instructions given by Rrod as they will be the same for all xgd3 games from now on:
http://www.ludibria.com/nfo.php?sys=x36&sysid=4766

Please, more seeds!

@Metalprofi666, 2133520 is the layer break for xgd3 discs and is too large for the standard dual layer, if you have it set to that the burn will fail at 50%. You need to have the break set to optimal or 2086912 as this is the max for the first layer of the disc.
